title: Who is the lender of my GLoan?
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [How can I update my mobile number for my GLoan account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30655381979161-How-can-I-update-my-mobile-number-for-my-GLoan-account)
- [Who is the lender of my GLoan?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30654917327129-Who-is-the-lender-of-my-GLoan)
- [How do I delete my GLoan account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30660239975833-How-do-I-delete-my-GLoan-account)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

GLoan partners with 3rd party Financial Institutions.

If you’re wondering how it can impact your loan experience, read on for important details:

### **Account Transfer**

Qualified loan accounts may be moved to these partner institutions, as stated in [GLoan Terms & Conditions.](https://new.gcash.com/terms-and-conditions/gloan)

### **Loan Terms**

**Your loan terms will not change**, whether with Fuse Financing Inc. or another partner. This means your payment schedule, dues, penalties, interest rates, and fees will stay the same. You may also continue making payments through GCash.

To find out if your loan is with **Fuse Financing Inc.** or a partner financial institution, **view your GLoan Disclosure Statement.**

### **Need more Help?**

For other inquiries or concerns, check out the following articles:

- [How much can I borrow with GLoan?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900005986946)
- [How can I update my mobile number for my GLoan account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30655381979161)
- [How can I pay my GLoan dues?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900007729563)
- [I have a concern with GLoan’s partner collection agencies. What should I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/39051454205465)
